name: Berk
description:
I’m an easy going, uncomplicated, happy with my life and who I am, man. My sense of humor is a little different. If you like to laugh…we’re going to get along just fine. I love the beach, swimming in the ocean, the moon and stars, meals out, meals in, good music, movies, dogs, golfing, fishing, and adore the company of an intelligent, funny, fun, witty, and engaging woman. Bottom line…I’m looking for something unique, with someone unique.
I believe in three things very strongly. #1. Life is short. Be yourself and be happy. #2. Laugh as often as possible. It’s good for the heart, mind, and soul. #3. If you say something…do it. If you don’t mean it…don’t say it. Things that are important to me: honesty, trust, respect, communication, and kissing! I think kissing reveals someone’s true passion and soul.
